Detailed Description

Waiting openIPMP user query context.

User query context waiting user query response. If user query message is != 0, it means that at the time of creation of user query message, tool was still not authenticated. In this case, user query message should be sent immediately after authentication is done. When user query response is received, handling function should then process (if any) waiting user query context.
